Name: Virago
About the game: Game Overview Virago is a 2D adventure survival game set in a sprawling, interconnected world with black and white graphics. Game Objective As Virago, your mission is to explore this gloomy town, wending your way past the horrible citizens and making it out alive. The path forward isn't always clear, and dangerous monsters may pursue you persistently and effortlessly, but if you keep going, discovering new paths and acquiring strong new weapons and skills, the town will open up to you, and you will eventually conquer it. FEATURES: Challenging gameplay that can be difficult but always fair. Fluid and responsive action. Explore a vast, connected town. A beautiful vintage graphics Traditional 2D animation brings creatures and characters to life Speak with and assist a cast of bizarre characters. Find powerful new abilities. The world Virago will be brought to life in vivid, moody detail, its bizarre and terrifying creatures each animated by hand in a traditional 2D style. The look of Virago is reminiscent of a lovingly crafted 2D animated movie. Vibrant characters and creatures and detailed environments will draw you deep into the world. Each new place youâ€™ll discover in your mission is strange, also with new creatures to meet. We want to make sure the world of virago is one worth exploring.
